description: Try our easy to follow Sweet & Sour Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork stir-fry,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Pork,Low sugar,Low fat
name: Sweet & Sour Pork Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red capsicum, deseeded, cut into thin strips
1 large carrot, peeled, halved lengthways, thinly sliced
1 brown onion, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a wok over medium-high heat until hot. Add 2 tsp of oil and swirl to coat. Stir-fry pork, in batches, for 2 minutes or until browned, adding more oil between batches. Transfer to a plate.
Add onion, carrot and capsicum to wok. Stir-fry for 2 minutes, add 1 tbs of water, cover and cook for 2 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

Drain pineapple, reserving 1/2 cup of the juice. Combine juice with sweet chilli, vinegar and flour. Add pineapple, beans, pork and sauce mix to wok. Toss until well combined, bring to the boil and cook for 2 minutes or until sauce thickens. Roughly chop half the coriander and stir through. Season.
Cook noodles in boiling water for 2 minutes. Drain and divide between serving bowls. Top with pork and remaining coriander. Serve.
